downloadDescription: Update to the VAMT Configuration files
detailsSection: This update enables the VAMT tool to deploy and activate keys for Windows 10 22H2 Extended Security Update programs
systemRequirementsSection: Latest ADK/VAMT and SQL server installed on the machine
installInstructionSection:
Get the latest ADK/VAMT here: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-hardware/get-started/adk-install

For VAMT Setup and Activation, Refer to: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/deployment/volume-activation/introduction-vamt

1) After installing the VAMT tool and SQL Server, download the pkconfig_win10_esu.xrm-ms configuration file.

2) Replace the file here: C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\10\Assessment and Deployment Kit\VAMT3\pkconfig with the new file
